department: Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada
short_summary: Conception technique et d'élaboration de futurs systèmes SAR numériques spatiaux
description: This procurement is for Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) to award the contract to a pre-identified supplier. The contract is for the conception, technical development and engineering of advanced Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) multimode digital systems for the RADARSAT-2 and RADARSAT Constellation Mission (RCM) satellites. The PRE-IDENTIFIED SUPPLIER is MacDonald Dettwiler and Associates Ltd (MDA). They propose a period of three years starting from Date of Award to December 15, 2025. Two (2) one (1) year options to extend the contract period are also proposed. (see Item #8 – Period of the proposed contract or delivery date:)
